laboratory_examinations.findings: Biopsy showed recurrence of his squamous cell carcinoma.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Mr. K had undergone multiple biopsies over the years, all initially negative, until this biopsy was positive for cancer.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Intraoperative frozen section margins did not show evidence of cancer.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The final pathological examination later revealed extensive involvement of the mandible to the lateral margin.
